attributes.action: Propose that Trump give net worth gains made during his presidency to charity
attributes.additional_details: Should Donald Trump's net worth increase this would obviously be helpful to the charity, who would gain funds. Perhaps the party to most benefit from this proposal, however, would be Donald Trump himself. By accepting and wholeheartedly endorsing and acting on this proposal he would be able to demonstrate his the purity and sanctity of his intentions. It would make people trust and believe in him. Priceless.
attributes.background: Donald Trump's net worth could be evaluated both now, and at the end of his Presidential term, by independent accountants. Should his net worth have increased during his Presidency, the UK government should propose that any increase be donated to charity, say UNICEF.

rejection.details: This would be a matter for President Trump, not the UK Government or Parliament.
